content.text: I'm in high school, I sleep a lot, I cs and ds, I love bruno mars, and I love sweets.

I wish I could speak another language, I enjoy learning about other cultures, I sit on my computer for several hours a day, I watch foreign movies and tv shows, and I'm bored with my current lifestyle.
I see you like to learn about other cultures. What languages do you want to learn?
I want to learn Spanish, French, and Japanese.
Nice! I've always wanted to learn Spanish. I've heard it's a beautiful language.
It is! It's also very useful to know, since so many people speak it.
Yeah, I think I'm going to start learning it next year.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be really good at it.
So, what do you like to do in your free time?
I like to watch movies, listen to music, and play video games.
Me too! I love watching foreign movies and tv shows. They're so much more interesting than the stuff we get in the US.
I agree! I love learning about different cultures and seeing how people live in other parts of the world.
It's so much fun! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! I'm always looking for new friends who like to do the same things I do.
Me too! I'm glad we met.
